ar: integration tests for complexity routing end-to-end

obj: Add missing BATS test coverage for Phase 4-5 scripts that lack tests: review-loop.sh, critique-loop.sh. Add integration test for complexity routing end-to-end path selection. Verify all existing tests still pass.

a: Create BATS tests for scripts/review-loop.sh covering 0-round, 1-round, max-round (2) scenarios
done: review-loop.sh has unit tests covering all round scenarios

a: Create BATS tests for scripts/critique-loop.sh covering early-exit at confidence >= 85, max 3 rounds, and no-critique scenarios
done: critique-loop.sh has unit tests covering confidence gates and round caps

a: Create integration test for complexity routing: trivial path skips Architect+Critique, medium path skips Architect, high path runs all steps
done: Integration test verifies correct agent skipping per complexity path

a: Run full test suite to verify no regressions from Phase 6 changes
v: bats tests/ exits 0 with all tests passing
done: Full test suite passes with zero failures
